forum.content:
￼

Hello,

We wanted to let you know the developer of the Android app 全民快打-Rock K.O., has replied to the Google Play review you wrote for it on Apr 24, 2015.

See the developer's reply on Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kimi.ggplay.sgzrtw&reviewId=Z3A6QU9xcFRPRmlzenU1WkZsbUJvNUNyOTRMR192a29VNFRZc1hSdkVCeFAxUUpSX25jdW9mdGh3OF9VOUpOSzF6SXVMYkpvZEdpa3YzeWItX2tOVDhBUnc

If you would like to discuss your issues in more detail with the developer, you can contact the developer directly by emailingKimi Entertainment.

Developer replies must adhere to the Posting Guidelines athttps://support.google.com/googleplay/android-developer/bin/answer.py?answer=138230. If you have concerns about the developer's reply to your review, please contact Google at https://support.google.com/googleplay/android-developer/bin/request.py?contact_type=coma.

If you don't want to receive further notifications when developers reply to your reviews, you may opt out athttps://play.google.com/unsub?eup=aALD2JI_txXaHh_IPd71au0hOkt_IBCQ7OSxHf_UVuv2LKRdSQMCKbaBExQvMX3_ua2cvDxcBi9ilcuHDerc37T24yZZFRjqMOw.

Sincerely,
The Google Play Developer Console Team
forum.title: 有人懂英文嗎 可以幫我看看這篇文章是在講什麼啊
